column4: i agree with the review on one thing: after the colorful approach of others, ubuntu default is "peaceful" like the reviewer says :)
also i like when the reviewer, a long time kde user, agrees that gnome is "a pleasure" :)
I'm a long time gnome user that switched to kde and doesnn't plan to go back ;P
oh yeas there are people like you as well. beautiful isn't it? :)
